name: Haloween Woocommerce
author: WP Kraken

sections.description:
Get your WooCommerce-based shop ready for Halloween! With 50 beautiful Halloween icons to choose from, you can reward your customers for using your website.

The plugin will display selected Halloween icons in random places on your website. If the client gathers enough of them, a popup with a coupon is displayed.

You are able to configure many aspects of the plugin’s behavior, such as:
Icons that should be displayed
Number of icons needed to get a coupon
The content of messages that will display to your customers
And many more!

The plugin was created during first WP Kraken’s hackathon. We are an in-house team of web development and design experts. We can handle any customization and development. Need a hand? Let us help!

Usage:
* Create WooCommerce Coupon
* Select it into the options
* Fill other settings and save them
sections.installation:
EN:

  • Upload the directory haloween-woocommerce in /wp-content/plugins/ or install the plugin over the plugin manager of WordPress.
  • Activate the plugin over the plugin manager of WordPress.

Usage:
* Create WooCommerce Coupon
* Select it into the options
* Fill other settings and save them
